comment._content:
Douglas C-54G-5-DO Skymaster 45-0534 c/n 35987 N88951 Pan Am 'Clipper Racer', converted to DC-4 standard and leased to PAA May 22, 1947, returned to USAF November 23, 1953.

Is this the same DC-4?
